document.full_text: outplayed by richard gasquet early on, eighth seed andy roddick exited indian wells on wednesday after partially recovering from a slow start and losing control of his temper in the second set.
document.title: andy roddick loses his cool, and his match, at indian wells
lines_and_colors: outplayed by richard gasquet early on, eighth seed andy roddick exited indian wells on wednesday after partially recovering from a slow start and losing control of his temper in the second set.
